code: import React from'react';function OGUserLogging(){var category=arguments.length>0&&arguments[0]!==undefined?arguments[0]:null;var event=arguments.length>1&&arguments[1]!==undefined?arguments[1]:null;if(localStorage.getItem('og_user_flags')!==null){var og_user_flags=JSON.parse(localStorage.getItem('og_user_flags'));}if(localStorage.getItem('og_user_events')!==null){var og_user_events=JSON.parse(localStorage.getItem('og_user_events'));}if(category){if(og_user_flags){og_user_flags.push(category);}else{var og_user_flags=[category];}localStorage.setItem('og_user_flags',JSON.stringify(og_user_flags));}if(event){if(og_user_events){og_user_events.push(event);}else{var og_user_events=[event];}localStorage.setItem('og_user_events',JSON.stringify(og_user_events));}}export default OGUserLogging;
